Be brave , be brave , be brave little boy And turn off the lights I’m home My roots The Parish #thehandsofstpatrick #thehowayatrilogy
Its time to control my demons Without a sea of alcohol #thehowayatrilogy
How can I protect you in this crazy world Magic mirrors and masks Perverted power Sexual pleasures Cloak & dagger #thehowayatrilogy
Is this really heaven You can bury your darkest secrets But eventually they scratch the surface #thehowayatrilogy
Caged my rage in a prison cell I spoke to the Gods They looked like they were sad If i smashed my face against the wall #thehowayatrilogy
I sat on top of the world Shook the hand with the man who abused my youth I crawled out of the lowest place #thehowayatrilogy
The Hands of St Patrick the last chapter in The Howaya Trilogy
Love is beauty and pain. But love is one of the greatest gifts we have in life. #love #irishplaywright
Love isn't a disney film or a classic romantic. But love is just stumbling through life with your best friend #love #irishplaywright
Love is sharing your food when ya really don't want to. Love is stupid fights and memorable make ups #love #irishplaywright
Love is making each other laugh with stupid accents and funny impressions that only you get #love #irishplaywright
Love is waking up at 4am to her snoring and not throwing her out of the bed #love #irishplaywright
My representation in the entertainment industry https://t.co/0Kcpw5Kn8N
Started to watch #TheOAonNetFlix great shout @jd120113
I loved you in the morning When your soul slept next to mine #thehandsofstpatrick #thehowayatrilogy https://t.co/8yiSN9nkDq
And lead you through the streets of Dublin The streets will always stop and listen to us #thehowayatrilogy
When your heart wants to be lonely The coastal path of Sentier du Littoral Let me take you by the hand #thehowayatrilogy
You amazed me and dazed me Etched your name forever on my soul I know where you go to Red Lippy #thehowayatrilogy
And sang like Stevie Nicks You Sank your teeth into my skin A slave to your perversity #thehowayatrilogy
But you would never get your lips wet Your name now heard in high fashion You danced liked Ginger Rodgers #thehowayatrilogy
I remember the side streets of Dublin Buskers playing with a burning ambition The two of us would sip our Irish whiskey #thehowayatrilogy
I don’t see colours anymore after Dave died The world is all just grey #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
I was praying that he would just wake up Pretend it was all one big joke #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Talking about how we can write the wrongs of the world down In pen and paper In a rehearsal room #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Until the ambulance took him away. I held him in my arms, Pissed drunk, #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
I wish I could tell you it was a beautiful way to die If there is such a thing But I sang to him #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
He died with a smile on his face I tried to wash the blood off my hands But couldn’t #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
A dreamer I held him in my arms Who’s to blame? God Me The driver Makes no sense #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
A thousand times a day If I didn’t give him a ticket Or we stayed in The Arts Club He was only 20 A child #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
I don’t have the guts to jump of this building and Kill myself. I play that moment in my head #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
It’s my fault he’s dead, I don’t deserve to walk this earth Feel the wind between my palms #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
She told me that he wanted to be like me A fella who worked in the same pub as him Now acting for a crust #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Before we crossed the road. I couldn’t lie to a mother who lost her only son. Her life, My buddy #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Ya better run fast before I slap the head off ya” His mother asked me what I said to him #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
The two of us pissed drunk Singing songs Talking shite. “Ya better run fast before I slap the head off ya” #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
I think about that moment every night The walk from The Arts club to The Old Vic Theatre #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
@JohnGNolan Thanks John , wishing you all the best for the year ahead .
Now All I see is grey No colour No life Just the sound of voices Tick Tick Tick Tock #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Standing On the edge of a rooftop I pray To feel the same energy That I felt that day #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
You care about, Or push away the only woman you’ve ever loved The will The spark To live Lost #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Write it down in pen and paper Live off fuck all but dreams and hope But when you lose people #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Pure passion Determination That we can right all the wrongs In a rehearsal room #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
About how we can change the world Outside The Young Vic Profit share plays Dingy shit holes Raw ambition #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Walking hand in hand with the woman I love Midnight Runs along the river Or a few cans Talking bullshit #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy
Standing Here I can see The National Theatre London Lit up In all its glory Memories #mybedsitwindow #thehowayatrilogy

My mother a warrior told me "no point in worrying about going blind tomorrow on an empty stomach, lets live for today" #mondaymotivation

I know a few of my friends have had a tough and challenging week. My thoughts, write all the anger down on a page. Then burn it ..
The best way to predict the future is to create it .In life you only fail in my eyes when you stop trying .
